review: It is really a little early in my experience for me to adequately rate Fire TV Stick.However, a few things are noteworthy. For one, installation is fairly simple. Of course, operational ease increases as you get the hang of the remote. It takes a little practice.In addition, the mobility of moving from one television to another in another room is convenient.So far, I am not overly impressed with the various offerings available, especially movies. I like old movies. It seems that those are either not available free with Prime or not available at all.Perhaps the more familiar I become with the unit, the more I may learn to like it in the future.

review: I cannot believe this thing is $39.  So easy to set up, use, and watch things on my TV instead of my laptop.  And, by the way, Transparent is just about the greatest show ever made. Not for the easily offended or uber conservative, but the writing and acting is just incredible.OK, I have also heard people say that the streaming stops and is jittery.  I've watched for at least 7 hours and have not had that happen once.I love love love the fire stick.
